sentences.en: All optical network is the tiptop form of optical fiber communication at the present day.
sentences.cn: 全光网络是当今光通信的最高形式,它的普及关键在器件.

sentences.en: Give me the gift of a pair of drip - dry, shipshape, tiptop socks.
sentences.cn: 给我一双滴乾的 、 整洁的 、 最好的短袜作礼物.

sentences.en: He kept his villa in tiptop shape.
sentences.cn: 他把他的别墅保持在顶尖的样子.

sentences.en: Her hair was thick, glossy and in tiptop condition.
sentences.cn: 她头发浓密、有光泽且发质一流。

sentences.en: Lipljan ( TIPTOP ) network security products and isolation card agents, DELL Computer supplier agreement, HP Reseller stores.
sentences.cn: 利普 ( TIPTOP ) 网络隔离卡及安全产品代理商, DELL电脑协议供货商, HP耗材放心店.

sentences.en: The Nobel Prize has become the tiptop glory of science.
sentences.cn: 诺贝尔奖已成为全世界公认的自然科学的最高荣誉.

sentences.en: The tiptop ambit of regional economic and financial cooperation just is complete economic integration historicpresent world.
sentences.cn: 区域经济金融合作的最高境界就是完全的经济一体化.

trans.tran_en: You can use tiptop to indicate that something is extremely good
